info.name: Car Listings Service API - Complete Collection
info.description:
üöÄ COMPREHENSIVE API TESTING COLLECTION

Complete testing suite for Car Listings microservice including ALL available endpoints with proper test scripts, error handling, and comprehensive coverage.

üî¥ IMPORTANT: Before testing, you MUST set up test users in the database!

üìã Setup Instructions:
1. Start the service: mvn spring-boot:run
2. Access H2 Console: http://localhost:8081/h2-console
3. Use connection details:
   - JDBC URL: jdbc:h2:mem:carlistingsdb
   - Username: sa
   - Password: password
4. Run the SQL from the 'Database Setup' folder
5. Test the APIs using the provided requests

üöÄ COMPLETE ENDPOINT COVERAGE:

üöó Car Listings (10 endpoints):
- CRUD operations, search, filtering, seller management
- Update, deactivate, mark as sold, get by seller
- Available makes/models lookup

üìä Analytics & Insights (11 endpoints):
- Popular cars (weekly, monthly, custom date ranges)
- Trending analysis, homepage recommendations
- View tracking, platform statistics
- Most favorited cars, search terms analysis
- User engagement metrics

üîç Inspection Management (12 endpoints):
- Create, update, reschedule inspections
- Buyer/seller inspection views
- Car-specific inspections, availability checking
- Message system with read/unread tracking
- Status management and notifications

üí∞ Market Analysis (15 endpoints):
- Market averages by make/model/year
- Price predictions and distributions
- Top performing models, high liquidity markets
- Model comparisons, market insights
- Depreciation analysis, admin refresh tools

üí≥ Transaction Management (13 endpoints):
- Create, update, cancel, complete transactions
- Purchase/sales history with filtering
- Car-specific transaction tracking
- User statistics and summaries
- Admin analytics and oversight

üíæ Saved Searches (5 endpoints):
- Create, update, delete saved searches
- User-specific search management

‚ù§Ô∏è Favorites (5 endpoints):
- Add/remove favorites, status checking
- User favorites management with pagination

üîç Search (2+ endpoints):
- Advanced search with multiple filters
- Keyword, price, year, location filtering

üß™ Integration Tests:
- End-to-end workflow testing
- Cross-endpoint validation

üìà TOTAL: 70+ API endpoints with comprehensive test coverage!

item.name: üóÑÔ∏è Database Setup
item.description: SQL queries to set up test users in H2 database. Copy and paste these into H2 Console.

request.description:
üîó H2 Console Access Instructions:

1. Open: http://localhost:8081/h2-console
2. Connection Settings:
   - JDBC URL: jdbc:h2:mem:carlistingsdb
   - Username: sa  
   - Password: password
3. Click 'Connect'
4. Copy the SQL from the requests below and run them

‚ö†Ô∏è This must be done before testing any car listings APIs!

üìù LEGACY METHOD - Copy this SQL and run in H2 Console:

```sql
-- Create test users for Car Listings Service
INSERT INTO users (username, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, password, role, active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES 
('johndoe', 'John', 'Doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '+61400123456', 'password123', 'SELLER', true, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP),
('janesmith', 'Jane', 'Smith', 'jane.smith@example.com', '+61400987654', 'password123', 'BOTH', true, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP),
('bobbuyer', 'Bob', 'Johnson', 'bob.johnson@example.com', '+61400555777', 'password123', 'BUYER', true, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP),
('adminuser', 'Admin', 'User', 'admin@example.com', '+61400000000', 'admin123', 'BOTH', true, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

-- Verify users were created
SELECT id, username, first_name, last_name, email, role FROM users;
```

‚ö†Ô∏è RECOMMENDED: Use the 'Complete Test Data Setup' endpoint instead!

üöÄ COMPREHENSIVE TEST DATA SETUP

‚ú® This endpoint creates comprehensive test data for ALL database tables:

üë• **15 Users** (sellers, buyers, admins, mixed roles)
üöó **25 Cars** (multiple makes, models, years, conditions)
‚ù§Ô∏è **30 Favourites** (user-car relationships)
üíæ **20 Saved Searches** (with various criteria)
üí≥ **15 Transactions** (different statuses and payment methods)
üîç **18 Inspections** (scheduled appointments)
üí¨ **50+ Inspection Messages** (conversation history)
üëÅÔ∏è **50 Car Views** (analytics data)
üìà **60 Market Averages** (price analysis data)
üìã **40 Audit Logs** (system activity tracking)
üîî **35 Notifications** (user alerts)

üìä **Total: 300+ records** across all tables!

‚úÖ **Features:**
- Realistic data with proper relationships
- Mixed statuses and conditions
- Proper foreign key relationships
- Ready for comprehensive API testing
- Includes admin users for advanced testing

‚ö° **One-click setup** - no SQL required!

üìà **DATABASE STATUS CHECK**

Get real-time counts of records in all database tables:

- ‚úÖ Users count
- üöó Cars count
- ‚ù§Ô∏è Favourites count
- üíæ Saved searches count
- üí≥ Transactions count
- üîç Inspections count
- üí¨ Inspection messages count
- üëÅÔ∏è Car views count
- üìà Market averages count
- üìã Audit logs count
- üîî Notifications count
- üìà **Total records** across all tables

Use this to verify data setup was successful!

exec: console.log('Database is now clean and ready for fresh test data!');

request.description:
üßπ **CLEAR ALL TEST DATA**

‚ö†Ô∏è **WARNING: This will delete ALL data from ALL tables!**

üóëÔ∏è This endpoint safely removes all test data in proper dependency order:

1. Notifications
2. Audit logs
3. Car views
4. Inspection messages
5. Inspections
6. Transactions
7. Market averages
8. Favourites
9. Saved searches
10. Cars
11. Users

‚ú® **Use cases:**
- Clean slate for testing
- Reset environment
- Remove old test data
- Prepare for fresh data setup

üîÑ **After clearing, run the 'Complete Test Data Setup' to repopulate!**
